Projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
desc: A modern and responsive portfolio website built to showcase my education, skills, and professional background in web development and AI.
The website features sections such as About Me, Education, Skills, Projects, and Contact, providing a complete overview of my journey as a developer and problem-solver.
It highlights my expertise in web technologies, SEO, digital marketing, and AI solutions, while also serving as a platform for potential clients or employers to connect with me.

Projects.title: Client Personal Protfolio Website
desc: A personal portfolio website that I created for a client. The website is built using two main tech, native (HTML, CSSS, JS) and react based (ReactJs, TailwindCSS, Typescript). The website also created based on the client design, and improved and sliced by me. The website has a few features such as a about page, a project page, resume page, and a contact page.

The website is created using a modern design and a clean interface that appeals to a wide audience. The website also has a responsive design that makes it easy to use on any device. The website also has a few animations that make the website more interactive and engaging.

Projects.title: Shahine E-commerce Website
desc: Welcome to the official Shahine website â€“ your online store for women's clothing and accessories based in El Jadida. The site offers a carefully curated selection of items, including pajamas, lingerie, bed covers, towels, sets, baby clothing, burkinis, sandals, and a variety of accessories.

The website was built using Next.js, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and Tailwind CSS, delivering a modern, responsive, and seamless user experience. It includes product pages, shopping cart functionality, order management, and full e-commerce features to facilitate online shopping.

Shahine aims to provide an enjoyable shopping experience with high-quality products and friendly service, allowing customers to explore and appreciate everything the store offers, both online and in-store at El Jadida.

Projects.title: Javanese Translation Website
desc: A Javanese ngoko - krama translation website that I created as a collaborative project with my friends. The website is built using the original Transformer architecture by Vaswani et al. (2017). Built with Python, TensorFlow, Flask, HTML, and CSS, the website allows users to input text in Javanese krama and receive the corresponding ngoko translation.

The website is designed to be simple to use, with a clean and modern interface that appeals to a wide audience. Users can input text in Javanese krama and receive the corresponding ngoko translation. The Project also provide ipynb file for the model training and the model itself.

Projects.title: SIPETI: Heart Prediction Website
desc: This is a Machine Learning based website that I created as a collage project. The website is built using Decision Tree algorithm and Flask. The website is a heart attack prediction website that can predict whether a person will get a heart attack or not based on their health condition.

In this website user can predict, customize dataset, customize model, and see the model performance. The website also has a few features such as a dashboard for the user to see the model performance, and a few charts to visualize the decision tree model.

Projects.title: Olympic Fitness Website
desc: Olympic Fitness is a website built to represent a premier fitness center founded in 2010, aimed at creating a community where everyone can achieve their personal best. The site showcases the gym's facilities, membership options, and services.
The website was developed using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ShadCN UI, Prisma, and MySQL, providing a modern, responsive, and user-friendly experience.

Key features include a BIM (Body Index Measurement) calculator, a gym schedule, monthly pricing plans, and the ability to select personal trainers. Users can manage their subscriptions, book classes, and track their fitness progress online.

Projects.title: WorkPall Manager Management System
desc: WorkPall is a Java-based console application designed as a Manager Management System to streamline the process of adding and reserving spaces for events or facilities.

The system supports two roles: Admin and Member. Admins can add new spaces, manage users, and oversee reservations, while Members can reserve available spaces, subscribe to events, and receive notifications about their bookings.
Built with Java Console, Swing, and MySQL, WorkPall provides a reliable and interactive interface for managing reservations, user accounts, and notifications efficiently.

Projects.title: RedFit
desc: RedFit is a community-driven platform for gym enthusiasts, designed as a Reddit-style website where users can share experiences, discuss workouts, and post fitness-related content.
The website features a modern, responsive UI and supports functionalities like posting, commenting, voting, and following topics or users, creating an engaging space for fitness communities.
Built with Spring Boot, Angular, and PostgreSQL, RedFit also includes unit testing to ensure reliability and maintainability of the application.

Projects.title: Gym Tracker App
desc: Gym Tracker App is a comprehensive club management system designed to automate member admission, trainer selection, and scheduling, making fitness programs more accessible and efficient.

The platform serves three types of users: Administrators, Members, and Trainers. Admins can manage members, trainers, programs, payments, and view feedback. Members can register, manage their profiles, view programs, reserve time slots, make payments, and evaluate trainers. Trainers can manage their profiles, availability, attendance, and track member progress.

The project enhances the user experience by simplifying admissions, facilitating reservations, and providing effective management tools for all users, ensuring a smooth and interactive fitness experience.

Projects.title: La Chambre Arbitrale Marocaine du Sport
desc: The CAS website represents the official platform for the 'Chambre Arbitrale du Sport', an independent judicial body under CNOM. Its mission is to resolve sports-related conflicts and disputes efficiently, reducing the need for recourse to ordinary courts.

The website provides a user-friendly interface where stakeholders can access case information, submit dispute documents, and track proceedings. It also offers resources and guidelines to ensure transparency and effective conflict resolution.

Projects.title: LUDOang
desc: LUDOang is a game that my team and I created for a final project in my university. The game is built python, pygame, and OpenGL. The game is a 2D game that is inspired by a Ludo game. The game has a few features such randomZone, and a 3D dice.

RandomZone is a feature that allows the player to get a random number of steps. The 3D dice is a feature that allows the player to roll a 3D dice. The game also has a few other features menuy screen and also loading screen.
Beside that the game also has a audio theme that will play when the game is started. The game also has a few sound effects such as dice roll sound, and a sound when the player win the game.

Projects.title: Console+ Gaming Platform
desc: Console+ has been a trusted source for gaming news since its inception in 2010. The platform delivers up-to-the-minute coverage of the gaming world, keeping passionate gamers informed about the latest developments in the industry.

This website serves as a dynamic hub for video game enthusiasts, providing news, forums, and access to the latest game trailers. Users can read in-depth reviews, participate in discussions, and stay connected with the gaming community.
Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, Console+ offers a modern, responsive, and interactive experience for gamers of all levels.

Projects.title: React Realtime Chat
desc: My ambitious project that delves into the world of interactive web development using React. This project is a realtime chat application that allows users to create chat rooms and chat with other users in realtime. The application is built using React, Firebase, and Daisy UI.

This project is my second react project and my first project using Firebase. I learned a lot about how to use Firebase and how to use React to create a realtime application. I also learned how to use Daisy UI, a CSS framework that is built on top of Tailwind CSS.

Projects.title: React Tools
desc: React Tools is a groundbreaking and user-friendly project that brings together a comprehensive collection of tools and components crafted with cutting-edge technologies, including React, React Router, and TailwindCSS. What sets this project apart is that it's not just a suite of powerful features, but it's also a significant milestone as it marks my very first venture into the world of React development.

Unlike traditional web applications, React Tools cleverly utilizes browser local storage, eliminating the need for external databases. This not only ensures seamless performance but also prioritizes user data privacy.

The Todo List keeps tasks in check with intuitive task management capabilities, ensuring you never miss a beat. The note-taking feature provides a hassle-free way to jot down ideas and crucial information, accessible whenever inspiration strikes. Additionally, our robust expense tracker simplifies financial management by recording and categorizing expenses, delivering insightful spending analysis.

Projects.title: Aleph Discord Bot
desc: Aleph is a Discord bot that I created for my dircord server to use. The bot is built using Python and the discord.py library. The bot has image grabber feauture that takes argument (keywords) and returns an image from the internet.

Other than that this bot has a few other features such as utility command to delete a messages, and a command to get the server's ping. This bot is still in development and I plan to add more features in the future.

Projects.title: LPTK Cup 2023 Website
desc: LPTK Cup UM is a website that I created for a competition held by  the Universitas Negeri Malang. The website is mainly built using Laravel and Bootstrap. The website has a few features such as a registration form, a login system, article system, file upload,  and a dashboard for the admin to manage the contents.

This project is my second freelance project, this project is not as big as my first freelance project but I learned a lot from this project. I learn how to manage a project and how to work with a team.

Projects.title: NU INO Website
desc: My first freelance project. This project is a website for a School based on a JALAKAR curriculum. The website is built mainly using Laravel and Bootstrap.
This website is LMS like system, have a user management, user auth, quiz and material for student and FAQ
In this project I learned how to work with a team and how to manage a project. I also learned new library such as livewire and alpine.js.

Projects.title: FashionHub Shopify Store
desc: FashionHub is a modern e-commerce store built on Shopify, offering a wide range of clothing and accessories for men and women. The store provides an intuitive shopping experience with easy navigation, responsive design, and secure checkout.

Customers can browse products by categories, view detailed product descriptions and images, add items to the cart, and complete purchases with multiple payment options. The store also features promotional banners, featured collections, and seasonal sales to enhance user engagement.
FashionHub aims to provide a seamless online shopping experience, helping users find stylish and high-quality apparel for all occasions.

Projects.title: Generative Trivia
desc: A generative trivia website built with Next.js, Firebase, NextAuth, Google OAuth, and TypeScript. Users can generate trivia questions for predefined school subjects and answer them with a unique interactive input style. The application supports user authentication with Google and stores data in Firestore.

The project is a culmination of my passion for web development and my desire to create a fun and interactive learning platform. The website is designed to be user-friendly and engaging, with a clean and modern interface that appeals to a wide audience. The trivia questions are generated using the Gemini API, which provides a diverse range of questions for users to answer.

Projects.title: Curator Shopify Store
desc: Curator is an e-commerce store built on Shopify, offering a curated selection of clothing for women and children. The store focuses on providing high-quality, stylish apparel with an intuitive and engaging shopping experience.

Users can browse products by categories, view detailed product descriptions and images, add items to the cart, and complete purchases with secure payment options. The store also features promotions, collections, and seasonal sales to enhance customer engagement.
Curator aims to deliver a seamless online shopping experience for families, helping customers find fashionable and comfortable clothing for women and children.

Projects.title: Memory Game
desc: Memory Game is a web application built using Angular where players test their memory by replicating sequences of colors. The game increases in difficulty with each level as the sequences grow longer, providing a fun and challenging experience.
The application features smooth animations, real-time score tracking, and responsive gameplay, making it accessible on both desktop and mobile devices.
Built with Angular, the game emphasizes interactive UI and a seamless user experience, perfect for users looking to sharpen their memory skills while having fun.
